short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to access TOTP and HOTP codes stored in the OTP Manager Nextcloud app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a web browser extension for the OTP Manager Nextcloud app. It allows you to quickly access your OTP codes synced via your Nextcloud server from your browser.

To use the extension first login to Nextcloud in your browser and then open the extension to connect.

This extension requires a Nextcloud server and the OTP Manager Nextcloud app to be installed: https://github.com/matteo-convertino/otpmanager-nextcloud/

Source code for this extension itself is available: https://github.com/beatles1/simple-otpmanager-browser
